EmailTemplate.name: VNS_DocumentationSurvey_112011_Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Survey - Deadline Extended Plus Enter to Win a Kindle Fire
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
DEADLINE EXTENDED - DECEMBER 5, 2011 VisiNet Solutions Documentation Survey
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
We truly value your feedback and strive to strenghten the quality of our products and services. In order to solicit more responses to our Documentation Survey, we've extended the deadline and included an opportunity to win a Kindle Fire.
We encourage you to take advantage of this opportunity and tell us what we can do to make our documentation more useful. Please click this link (http://www.surveymonkey.com/s/2011-VisiNetDocumentation) to complete a quick 5-minute documentation survey.
For your participation in our Documentation Survey, all new and previously entered survey responses will be included in a drawing for a Amazon's Kindle Fire. The deadline for entry is Monday, December 5.
Sincerely,
Yvonne Stringer Quality Assurance Manager TriTech Software Systems | VisiNet Solutions
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems
9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121
